# isActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the color well is currently active.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isActive: Bool { get }
```

## Activating and deactivating color wells

- **activate(_:)**: Activates the color well, displays the color panel, and synchronizes the two UI elements.
- **deactivate()**: Deactivates the color well.
